author: cedric
msg: Correct a bug encountered with Orion.
Change the way the body value is detected and stored in the class. Now, the
attribute 'value' is correctly released after the tag call.

author: cedric
msg: Add toString() method outputting current factories.
This enable the ViewAction which now work again.

author: cedric
msg: Change TilesAction to use execute() instead of perform().
This is consistent with the new Struts behavior.
Change is backward compatible : Classes implementing old tilesAction's perform()

author: cedric
msg: Servlet is no more needed with Struts1.1. It shows a warning message if used
